thread.title: Muse, Wiz Khalifa, G-Eazy & Bassnectar Headlining 2017 Bunbury Music Festival
thread.title_full: Muse, Wiz Khalifa, G-Eazy & Bassnectar Headlining 2017 Bunbury Music Festival

author: NHHMS
title: Muse, Wiz Khalifa, G-Eazy & Bassnectar Headlining 2017 Bunbury Music Festival
text:
http://www.billboard.com/files/styles/promo_225/public/media/muse-performance-2015-billboard-1548.jpg 
The 2017 Bunbury Music Festival will feature headlining slots from Muse , Wiz Khalifa , G-Eazy , Bassnectar and Pretty Lights . Also on this year’s roster for the June 2-4 fest on the banks of the Ohio River in downtown Cincinnati, Ohio, are: The 1975, Thirty Seconds to Mars , Death Cab For Cutie, The Shins, AFI, Jon Bellion, D.R.A.M., Flogging Molly, MUTEMATH, Tech N9ne, Watsky and Mike Stud. 
At press time the Bunbury date was one of only three announced headlining shows by Muse this summer, with the other two coming at the legendary Reading and Leeds Festivals in England. Bunbury is also one of only two announced summer tour stops so far for Khalifa and as of Tuesday (Jan. 24) the Jared Leto-led Mars’ only other official show in 2017 is their annual Camp Mars event in Malibu, California, on Aug. 12-14. 
General admission tickets for the festival are available now here . With more acts to be named at a later date, other acts on the roster this year include: Moon Taxi, Reverend Horton Heat, NF, Hayley Kiyoko, Kevin Garrett, Protoje, Eden, Cobi, Arkells, Civil Twilight, CVBZ, San Fermin, July Talk, VHS Collection, Dreamers, Frenship, Charlie Hirsch, White Reaper, CAAMP, Time Cat, The Upset Victory, Liberty Deep Down, Flying Underground and Current Events.
